body:
Hey guys this is my very first proper video on youtube, I hope you enjoy.
Any tips? tell me bellow.
Dont forget to leave a comment, like or even subscribe i dont know anyway enjoy the video :)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BYew1pick9M

title: Very First Youtube Video - Nebula

replies.body:
Hey man! Thanks for sharing the video. 
Loved the music, I personally use oCam its free and doesn't have a water mark although it can be laggy. 
Keep it up and I cant wait to see more!
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body:
Hey matty! I love this montage.
The skill in your clips are amazing, I use QuickTime player to record, no watermark, and doesn't lag.
Subbed, I want to see more!

replies.body: Nice video, you sound like Remy XD

replies.body:
Thanks for all your support ill try those recorders and ill be happy to make another :) p.s it was only a 4 minute video but it takes a while to edit :P i turned 1h 40m of video into 4 minutes.
Thanks, Matt
